word:
In moving the college from Battle Creek and establishing it in Berrien Springs, Brethren Magan and Sutherland have acted in harmony with the light 


                                    -261- 

that God gave. They have worked hard under great difficulties. . . . God has been with them. He has approved of their efforts.--Ms 54, 1904, p. 1. (Remarks made at Berrien Springs, Michigan, May 23, 1904.)
